tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_maintenance_records (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_name VARCHAR(255),
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(100),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_maintenance_records (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    mechanic_name VARCHAR(50),
    cost DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedules (
    schedule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    schedule_date DATE,
    frequency VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    make VARCHAR(255),
    model VARCHAR(255),
    year INT,
    mileage INT
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance (
    maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(255),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    mechanic VARCHAR(255),
    cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle (vehicle_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 make VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 year INTEGER NOT NULL,
 mileage INTEGER NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 vehicle_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
 service_date DATE NOT NULL,
 service_description TEXT,
 cost DECIMAL(10, 2));

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (schedule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 vehicle_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
 next_service_date DATE NOT NULL,
 service_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_log (log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 record_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
 service_completed BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
 completion_date DATE,
 mechanic_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE vehicle (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 make VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 year INT NOT NULL,
 vin VARCHAR(17) UNIQUE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_record (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 vehicle_id INT NOT NULL,
 maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 date DATE NOT NULL,
 cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 vehicle_id INT NOT NULL,
 schedule_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 frequency INT NOT NULL,
 last_performed DATE
)

CREATE TABLE mechanic (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 phone VARCHAR(15) UNIQUE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_plan (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 schedule_id INT NOT NULL,
 mechanic_id INT NOT NULL,
 planned_date DATE NOT NULL
)
